title: The Last meow: 'Valse Triste', Jean Sibelius
brief_description: Excerpt from “Allegro Non Troppo” by Bruno Bozzetto with music by Jean Sibelius. A scrawny cat prowls the crumbling ruins of a house, remembering the warmth and snugness of family life he once enjoyed. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
